content_descriptors.notes: Third person adventure game with frequent violence and blood with some mature language.

legal_notice: The story, all names, characters, and incidents portrayed in this production are fictitious. No identification with actual persons (living or deceased), places, buildings, and products is intended or should be inferred. Cat Apocalypse by Carlos M Martinez ©2024 © all rights reserved
name: Cat Apocalypse Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10-11
  • Processor: Intel Core 8 generations +
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1060 series + AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: We recommend 6G in the video card for better performance. 4G video cards can run the game as well.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core 9 generetion + AMD Ryzen 5000 series
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2060-3060 + AMD Radeon 6600 8G +
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: We recommend saving the game in a SSD
